subject: Re: Darkness Radio tonight
author: psi_research
full_text:
Hi Joel, if I spoke other languages I would try. There seems to be
some psychic link between the experimenter and the device so responses
in a language you cannot speak could be challenging.

 If any of my peers on this forum have statements or observations that
could be shared I will try to work those in tonights interview. I went
ahead and agreed to the interview after first conferring with Frank as
I want this to represent the work done by the members here. -Bill

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, joel smith <sparky1j41@...> wrote:
>
> well good luck . hey i was wondering if the tech on the other side
only understand English or has anyone tried to see if other languages
 would work also ?
> 
> psi_research <vilhellm@...> wrote:                               The
folks behind the event at The Stanley Hotel that Frank attended
>  last month have invited me for a chat tonight to discuss ITC. I'll be
>  on Darknessradio.com at 9 p.m. Pacific time. This message has been
>  posted after speaking to Frank since for me, ITC includes the research
>  that is covered by this group as well as the video ITC experiments
>  I've done. -Bill
>  
>  
>      
>                                
> 
>

> Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. 
Try it now.
